features: Cocoa Butter Lotion: This 48 hour cocoa butter daily moisturizing body lotion features a light cocoa scent and provides deep hydration; a moisturizer for all skin types, from normal to dry to eczema prone skin, and a great after-sun lotion

Deep Hydrating Lotion for Dry Skin: This lotion is made with Cocoa Butter to naturally moisturize and Vitamin E to help improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks and skin imperfections, giving a more even and toned appearance

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair
body.description: Heal, soften, and smooth rough dry skin with Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula daily body lotion for dry skin, crafted with intensively moisturizing Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E. This velvety soft formula can also be used as a hand lotion or a foot lotion, as it's non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, creating a protective barrier that locks in deep and long-lasting moisture. A lightly fragranced unisex skin moisturizer, this body lotion for women or men is appropriate for all skin types and comes in a convenient pump bottle. Proudly made in U.S.A., Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. America's #1 Cocoa Butter brand, Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula uses the highest quality natural ingredients for superior moisturization head-to-toe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super moisturizing, thick.
reviews.reviewText: Best body lotion on the market. It's super thick more of a body cream. Makes my skin feel like butter, moisturizes major dry skin over night. None of the other products I've used have ever moisturized this well. Probably because it's one of the only products that's not watered down with alcohol and water, and not loaded with petroleum. It has actual moisturizing ingredients. Very nice mild smell. Sinks into skin well, not super greasy. Super thick consistency. Very affordable. But the spout bottle leaves a ton of product at the bottom that the spout can't get out, so I have to use a utility knife to cut the bottle in half to get the rest out, There'd be a lot of product wasted if I didn't, still a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing beats Palmer's!
reviews.reviewText: Best for the winter/ dry skin season. So soft and smooth, and makes your skin feel amazing. The scent is natural, light and perfect. Never feels oily or cakey, and provides a perfect level of deep moisturizing when skin is very dry. Daily use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teen loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My teen daughter requested this, I've never used it before, but she loves it. She made me try it and it seems to absorb well, light scent and your skin stays hydrated. I'll be ordering some for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried palmers oil in the Pass and find it terrific for most skin problems. When I saw it came for a very reasonable price along with a lotion with which I was not familiar I decided to take a chance and I'm glad I did. The lotion is very healing and does not leave a residue on your clothes or sheets. Using it overnight leaves any skin problems on the road to healing as well as soft and natural feeling. I would definitely buy this again. I have a Lotta respect for pPlmers products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have used Palmers for 20 years
reviews.reviewText: I have used Palmer cocoa butter lotion for almost 20 years. I have always loved the quality, very rich and long lasting. The smell has always been subtle but noticeable. A bottle of the lotion has always lasted me a few months or more with every day usage. Having said that, the bottle of lotion I received is much different in quality than I’ve ever noticed from this brand before. The lotion is very thin and the smell is very fake, like hot cocoa powder mix.I’m hoping this is a one off. I will continue to buy this product until this become a recurrence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to lotion
reviews.reviewText: 10/10, amazing scent makes me feel like a walking dessert! Love the texture and love how it hydrates my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for winter
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing and does magic to heal dry hands due to cold weather. Makes your hands smell like chocolate too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
reviews.reviewText: Very much natural , and keeps skin moist! Love it , will be purchasing again 😍

I use this daily on my head as I'm an unfortunate bald man. The cream smells great and keeps my skin feeling soft and healthy. It can be a bit thick feeling in the summer sometimes but if I rub it in well enough it's not a worry.

Não gosto muito de cremes hidratantes porque alguns deles deixam a pele meio “pegajosa”. Resolvi comprar este e me surpreendeu de forma positiva! É um creme consistente, mas que espalha facilmente na pele. O cheiro dele é de chocolate, bem suave, e eu achei muito agradável. Ele é absorvido rapidamente pela pele, deixando-a com um toque “aveludado”. Dá pra notar que é feito da mais pura manteiga de cacau, até pela cor meio amarelada. Como nada é perfeito, o único contra é a embalagem, que é bonita, mas que peca no pump. O creme, por ser bastante consistente, sai com um pouco de dificuldade, e até virando a embalagem de cabeça para baixo é difícil fazer com que ele saia facilmente.

Crema corporal súper hidratante. Mi piel de las manos es muy delicada, se me secan muy rápido cuando tengo contacto por mucho tiempo con jabón de lavar trastes o detergentes. Esta es la única crema que me las reparó. Además huele muy rico
This product does everything it says it will. Leaves skin super velvety and smelling delicious. I love this!
Crema molto idratante e per nulla untuosa, ottimo prodotto. La profumazione n0n la amo particolarmente ma ciò che conta è l'idratazione.
